title: [9/12/18] Delay Unlocking Odyssey Difficulties & Augments
body:
Greetings, 

As per recent Red Posts and the Service Status page, Riot are currently aware of delays in unlocking further Odyssey levels beyond intro and augments. If you experience a delay, it should probably last ~~about 1-15 minutes~~ up to 2 hours, and if you encounter any further delay, feel free to drop a comment below. 

> **Network Operations – 7 minutes ago**
We're aware of a problem granting rewards in Missions and are working on a fix. All rewards gathered during this time will be granted after this is resolved.

[](https://.)
> **Network Operations – 12:58 PM**
We are seeing some delays for players receiving Augments and are currently investigating.

[](https://.)
> [{quoted}](name=Mortdog,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=QlPtuKq6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-09-12T22:14:28.056+0000)
>
> Give it some time. Mine took around 15 minutes. The mission service is currently experiencing delays. Sorry about that! Trying to fix ASAP.

At this time, the Moderation Team asks that you please consolidate discussion on this topic in either this thread or an earlier topic. Thanks.

replies.body: My augment slots won't even open, i am on captain and I still only have the first slot open and I cant even change that. The other ones still have locks on them.

same here. what happened was i didn't click "Blast Off" in the little mission tab bar. none of the missions will trigger without clicking that, and then you get augment slots through missions.

feels like a really frustrating and superfluous decision to me, i played this thing for an hour with getting any of this stuff, kinda ruined it for me
Same for me, cry

Same here...I'm getting augment rewards but the slots won't open and I"m not getting any other rewards other that augments....

bunch of time wasted and about ruining it for me too
Literally 3 weeks later and I still have this problem. This is such a trash mode without augments. Please fix this
me too mate

go to the missions and click "blast off".
after this do the intro and see if you have a slot avaiable
Missions won't update, Cleared odyssey twice and mission doesn't update

This might be dumb to say but if you play the new game mode without going to the mission page and clicking "blast off" you won't be granted augment slots
resulting in a lot of players unaware of why they didn't unlock any augment slots even when winning the games.

Not only do the Augments not show up after completing a game. The Weekly Missions don't keep track of the progress I've made.
Because of this, I don't think I'm able to collect any Tokens/Event Items. 
I hope that the issue will be fixed soon. This is a really dope game mode and would like to play more like it.

LOL how about 5 hours and still not updating... Way to sprint through pushing an event game and not even run it through the PBE so it wouldnt crash first day out. Pathetic. I remember when Riot would give compensation for servers crashing and bs like this. Now riot gives us a big middle finger and expects us to be grateful. Silly company.

Why would they give you compensation for this when it's not even crashing the server and when things are resolved you get everything you didn't receive o.O your post makes no sense, if you didn't want to deal with the delay you could of just waited till another day instead of spamming runs knowing there is a delay and something was wrong, they'll probably just extend the event a day and tadaaaaa problem solved.

played the things to complete missions. left. came home, still not updated. Please, the amount of money riot gets from us an they still cant get a game mode right without crashing the first day its out. Pathetic.
Unforeseen issues happen no matter how large a company you are. Even Google has issues.

This would have been resolved if they took the time to run it through the PBE, but they dont. This has been an ongoing issue of riot not learning from mistakes and continuing to not listen to the community.

All they have to do is extend the event by a day and literally then who the heck cares??? no harm caused and why spoil an event by putting it onto PBE it's literally a stupid idea, when an event comes you want a surprise from it not something you've already ran or seen. If it was content staying in the game then sure run it through the PBE but this is a temporary event and nobody wants a spoiled event.
I’ve unlocked up to the onslaught difficulty and have at least 8 augements scattered around the different champs but all the augments slots are locked for me and I cannot equip them
Exact same problem here

Been well over two hours now, it seems this is common now and people are waiting quite some time(3hours+) so it’s not up to two anymore! Hoping its fixed soon so I can complete the missions! Thank you to those working to fix this as we wait!
I also have played SEVERAL rounds with no mission progress or unlocks of any kind.
Been over 2 hours for me too. I'd really like to use augments and all but im stuck on Intro mode and cant complete even a single mission, Odyssey or regular mode related
I feel like im not going to receive my augments i played  hours for feels bad man
You'll receive them! Hang tight!
Hang tight?  3 days later and STILL haven't got crap....
Which rewards have you not received?
Yea it's been over 3 hours since mission progress has updated here. Hopefully I don't have to redo missions like I had to last event.
Been +3 hours since i beat Odyssey intro, have played 4 more since and am still at intro.
Still experiencing delay after an hour of finish the intro...
All missions progress / rewards have been halted until the bug is fixed - you'll receive your rewards right after.

I've been sitting at 1445 / 1.5k for BLow Up More Space Nerds for 4+ hours.  I wonder if they'll ever get the expertise to handle handing out missing progress like this.  It seems every single event they have.  There's a critical issue and people stop getting progress.  Not to be a debby downer, but I am doubtful.
Rewards will be granted after the issue is resolved if that's your concern.

> [{quoted}](name=Riñey,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=cH0EnEMq,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-09-13T01:55:33.342+0000)
>
> Rewards will be granted after the issue is resolved if that's your concern.

Well... they said that the last event, and I had to redo a few games to get the rewards.  So yeah it is a concern.  However, they did say to drop a comment if it has been 2+ hours.
All mission rewards / progress has been halted until the bug has been fixed, so there isn't a specific time frame as to when you would receive your rewards anymore.
I bought the KDA ward skin for 150 blue essences, but i never got it... Not owned :c
I got an AFK buster. And my delayed queues gets me kicked out from the queue.... Can something be done about this issue? Thanks
I have about 6 on each character and still cannot equip any augments on. Also on captain
My augment slots won't even unlock, there isn't a point to play the game mode like this.
mine still are locked since launch of this mode...
My augment slots won't even open, i am on captain and I still only have the first slot open and I cant even change that. The other ones still have locks on them.

My game is Lagging so much that i can't even play.
My **FPS-Numbers** are jumping between 00 and 133!!!

Is ther anything i can do against it?
Problem solved! Yayyyyyyy

12/15 augments for all characters and still my slots are locked. Can't see the missions, tried captain mode once, no rewards besides augments that I can't use, can't edit my one slot and yes I ve tried right clicking, even removed the game and downloaded again. No tokens apart fron which I bought. And yes I ve hit the blast off button!
I'm not leveling up doing the missions. Anyone know why?
I think it has to do with the augments?Not sure since mine are still locked...

I can't find the mission tab bar. I have looked at some streamers on youtube and haven't find one that shows the mission tab bar. I have played some games, got some augments and all the slots are locked. I am moving on. It is a pointless, stupid game feature that you have to click something to open the slots. It should happen automatically.

HI for those struggling to unlock their aug slots. !!!
make sure to click Blast off where u check your daily missions otherwise missions and augmentation slots will not unlock no matter how much you play.
if you just started playing without clicking blast of augs will unlock but not aug slots and you will not level up.
I did 3 intros, wtf irto, let me get my rewards. I know your doing my best, but i just want to play this on a  harder difficulty QQ
augments still locked.... will we get an answer or just left like that? this is frustrating...
Augments slots still locked, have only one open and even can't change it. It's been like that since the beginning.
that *** i canot open any of my augmentation or play with them...i have no mission...nothing ! i see the augments i have unlock..but cannot do **** with them... :( GRRR{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
